content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Maryam Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was 830 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner Maryam Abbasi as a 10. She was very pleasant to deal with and showed a clear commitment to a long-term lease, which made the negotiation process smooth and enjoyable.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. Maryam Abbasi was respectful and professional throughout the entire process.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel discriminated or offended. The negotiation went well, and I found Maryam Abbasi to be a polite and reasonable person. We reached a fair agreement that satisfied both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt
